text: Peter Cundall, AM (1 April 1927 - 5 December 2021) was an British-Australian horticulturalist, conservationist, author, broadcaster and television personality in Australia. Until the age of 81, Cundall continued to be a presenter of the ABC TV program Gardening Australia. His last show aired on 26 July 2008. Cundall died on 5 December 2021 at the age of 94 after a short illness. ==References== ==Other websites== * Conversation with Peter Cundall & Stephen Munroe , National Museum of Australia, 3 April 2009 Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British television presenters Category:British radio personalities Category:Australian television presenters Category:People from Manchester
title: Peter Cundall
